posts.post_content:
@Atali, Superllama12, Polychromatic: Vigilance is green since Lorwyn:  
[Oakgnarl Warrior](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oakgnarl Warrior)  
[Wilt-Leaf Cavaliers](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wilt-Leaf Cavaliers)  
[Favor of the Overbeing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Favor of the Overbeing)  
[Beacon Behemoth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Beacon Behemoth)  
[Joraga Bard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Joraga Bard)  
[Snapping Creeper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Snapping Creeper)  
  
It just hasn't showed up in any particularly interesting card, save for the Cavaliers maybe, but that was part white, so people didn't notice too much. I can say I'm happy to say a big cool rare with it (and with a fitting second keyword). Maybe, if this gets popular, green vigilance will be more known.  
  
More than black haste, anyway.
posts.html:
@Atali, Superllama12, Polychromatic: Vigilance is green since Lorwyn:
Oakgnarl Warrior
Wilt-Leaf Cavaliers
Favor of the Overbeing
Beacon Behemoth
Joraga Bard
Snapping Creeper

It just hasn't showed up in any particularly interesting card, save for the Cavaliers maybe, but that was part white, so people didn't notice too much. I can say I'm happy to say a big cool rare with it (and with a fitting second keyword). Maybe, if this gets popular, green vigilance will be more known.

More than black haste, anyway.

Posted By: lorendorky (4/29/2011 12:37:34 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
TURN ONE WIN IN STANDARD:
  
opening hand: 2 [Chancellor of the Tangle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chancellor of the Tangle) , 1 [Chancellor of the Forge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chancellor of the Forge) , 1 [Tainted Strike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tainted Strike) , 1 Swamp and 2 [Groundswell](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Groundswell).
  
   
Gameplan: Reveal all 3 chancellors, get a 1/1 haste goblin and 2 {G} your first turn.
  
Drop Swamp, and than play both groundswells with your mana from Chancellor of the tangle (making goblin a 9/9) swing with goblin, tap swamp and cast Tainted strike, you now have a 10/9 infect haste.
  
   
probably not gonna get this as your opening hand and it can be stopped but the fact its possible is still scary. stuff like this is why they made [gut shot](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=gut shot) and [mental misstep](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=mental misstep) .
posts.html:

opening hand: 2 Chancellor of the Tangle , 1 Chancellor of the Forge , 1 Tainted Strike , 1 Swamp and 2 Groundswell.

Gameplan: Reveal all 3 chancellors, get a 1/1 haste goblin and 2 {G} your first turn.
Drop Swamp, and than play both groundswells with your mana from Chancellor of the tangle (making goblin a 9/9) swing with goblin, tap swamp and cast Tainted strike, you now have a 10/9 infect haste.

probably not gonna get this as your opening hand and it can be stopped but the fact its possible is still scary. stuff like this is why they made gut shot and mental misstep .

posts.post_content:
Awesome ability...but I wonder why they went with reach over trample?  
  
I guess wizards figured they had already given us [Baloth Woodcrasher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Baloth Woodcrasher), [Ezuri's Brigade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ezuri's Brigade), [Terra stomper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terra stomper), & [Liege of the Tangle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Liege of the Tangle)...so we had enough gigantic trample for some time...  
  
Although with the new squad hawk filled meta, maybe reach will be more valuable...
